lyric:
[00:19.200]Ohh babe... Ohh babe...
[00:35.200]The nights are long, My days are cold
[00:39.200]Without the warmth you provide me when I hold
[00:43.200]You in my arms feels so long ago
[00:47.200]When you were there...
[00:48.900]I think a teardrop just fell down..
[00:50.900]I really wanna come to see you
[00:51.900]I really really wish I could
[00:54.900]Maybe in a couple weeks, It\'s only a couple weeks...
[00:58.900]But even know I get to, It\'s 14 days I gotta get trough （it\'s too many days babe）
[01:04.900]And I\'m really really missing you..
[01:06.900]And I miss, miss, Miss..
[01:09.900]I\'m missing you..
[01:10.900]And I don\'t know..
[01:12.900]How I\'m gonna make it trough..
[01:14.900]But I gotta, gotta, stay strong for us two..
[01:19.900]I\'m a man, It\'s a job that I gotta do
[01:22.900]So I go outside and I fake a smile..
[01:27.900]But if they only knew, Just how many miles..
[01:31.900]Were between love so true
[01:33.900]I really couldn\'t cope the way that we do （that we do..）
[01:37.900]And I\'m really really missing you, You, you..
[01:40.900]Baby when you\'re near, All of my visions clear
[01:44.900]But like a magic show, I blink and than you disapear..
[01:48.900]And I frequently, Envision of it would be..
[01:52.900]To have you alone with me..
[01:53.900]Give me a moment so I can breathe ..
[01:58.500]Ok. I really wanna come to see you, Baby I wish I could ...（Wish I could..）
[02:03.800]Maybe in a couple weeks （It\'s only two weeks）
[02:05.800]It\'s only a couple weeks （But the problem is..）
[02:07.800]Even though I get to.. It\'s 14 long days that I don\'t have you.. （It\'s too many days babe）
[02:14.800]And I\'m really really missing you..
[02:15.800]And I miss, miss, Miss..
[02:18.800]And I\'m really really missing you..
[02:20.100]And I don\'t know..
[02:22.100]How I\'m gonna make it trough..
[02:25.100]But I gotta, gotta, stay strong for us two..
[02:30.100]I\'m a man, It\'s a job that I gotta do
[02:33.100]So I go outside and I fake a smile..
[02:37.100]But if they only knew, Just how many miles..
[02:41.100]Were between love so true
[02:44.100]I really couldn\'t cope the way that we do （that we do..）
[02:48.100]And I\'m really really missing you, You, you..
[02:51.100]Cuz maybe one day babe
[02:52.100]Not too far away
[02:55.100]We can turn, all our dreams into memories. （Not gonna be like this forever right）
[03:01.100]Baby we\'ll have that home, Stars stares, all that we share..
[03:04.100]Too many nights, over the phone. I really wanna come to see you （uhuh）
[03:08.100]Baby you know I do.. Maybe in a couple weeks （I\'ll try）
[03:12.100]It\'s only a couple weeks （Can\'t promiss..）
[03:15.100]But even know I get to, Still don\'t wanna be away from you..
[03:18.100]It\'s too many days babe, And I\'m really really missing you
[03:23.100]And I miss, miss, Miss.. I miss you..
[03:27.100]And I don\'t know （I don\'t know） How I\'m gonna make it trough..
[03:31.100]But I gotta, gotta, Hold strong for us two （strong for us two）
[03:36.100]I\'m a man, It\'s a job that I gotta do. So I go outside （I\'ll go outside）
[03:41.100]And I fake a smile （I\'ll fake a smile）
[03:44.100]But if they only knew, Just how many miles..
[03:48.100]Were between love so true, I really couldn\'t cope the way that we do.
[03:54.100]And I\'m really really missing you...
[04:20.100]
tlyric:
[by:墨尔本的情书]
[00:19.200]噢 宝贝
[00:35.200]长夜漫漫 我度过的每天都寒冷彻骨
[00:39.200]因为没有了我抱着你时你给我的温暖
[00:43.200]你在我的怀抱中似乎是很早以前的事了
[00:47.200]当你还在这时
[00:48.900]我想我刚落泪了
[00:50.900]我真的很想去见你
[00:51.900]我真的希望我能够这么做
[00:54.900]也许是几周以后 仅仅是几周以后
[00:58.900]但即使知道我可以 我要忍受14天的痛苦（宝贝 这日子太长了 ）
[01:04.900]我真的真的很想你
[01:06.900]我想 我想
[01:09.900]我想你
[01:10.900]我不知道
[01:12.900]我该怎么做到忍受这痛苦
[01:14.900]但是我会为了我们两个变得坚强
[01:19.900]我是一个男人 这是我该做的事
[01:22.900]所以我走出门去 虚伪的笑着
[01:27.900]我真的希望 在我走过的几英里路上的人们 他们都知道我的笑容是装出来的
[01:31.900]但是我们的爱情是真的
[01:33.900]真的不能再违背自己的心
[01:37.900]我真的真的很想你 你 你
[01:40.900]你在我身边的时候 得明明白白
[01:44.900]但像一个魔术表演一样 一眨眼的功夫 你不见了 消失了
[01:48.900]我经常设想我能
[01:52.900]我能让你和我在一起
[01:53.900]给我一段时间 要让我能喘息一下
[01:58.500]我真的想去见你 宝贝我希望我可以 （希望我可以）
[02:03.800]也许是几周以后 （仅仅只有两周）
[02:05.800]仅仅是几周以后 （但是问题是）
[02:07.800]即使我熬过 没有你的漫长的14天（亲爱的这的太多了）
[02:14.800]我真的真的很想你
[02:15.800]我想 我想
[02:18.800]我真的真的很想你
[02:20.100]我不知道
[02:22.100]我该怎么做到忍受这痛苦
[02:25.100]但是我会为了我们两个变得坚强
[02:30.100]我是一个男人 这是我该做的事
[02:33.100]所以我走出门去 虚伪的笑着
[02:37.100]我真的希望 在我走过的几英里路上的人们 他们都知道我的笑容是装出来的
[02:41.100]但是我们的爱情是真的
[02:44.100]真的不能再违背自己的心
[02:48.100]我真的真的很想你 你 你
[02:51.100]因为也许有一天
[02:52.100]那天不会很远
[02:55.100]我们能把梦想变成现实 然后装进美好的回忆里（永远像这样 好吗）
[03:01.100]宝贝 我们会有一个家 一起看星星 我们共同享受
[03:04.100]多少个夜里 我们打电话的时候 我真的想去见你
[03:08.100]宝贝你知道我会的 也许几个星期后（我会努力）
[03:12.100]仅仅是几周后（我不能保证）
[03:15.100]但即使知道 我知道不想离开你
[03:18.100]太久了 我真的很想你
[03:23.100]想你 想你
[03:27.100]我不知道（我不知道） 我该怎么做到忍受这痛苦
[03:31.100]但是我会为了我们两个变得坚强（为了我们两个变得坚强）
[03:36.100]我是一个男人 这是我该做的事  所以我走出门去
[03:41.100]虚伪的笑着
[03:44.100]我真的希望 在我走过的几英里路上的人们 他们都知道我的笑容是装出来的
[03:48.100]但是我们的爱情是真的  真的不能再违背自己的心
[03:54.100]我真的真的很想你
